titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning conscience wherein an account is given of the nature and rule and obligation of it : and the case of those who separate from the communion of the Church of England as by law established, upon this pretence, that it is against their conscience to join in it, is stated and discussed.
titleStmt.author: Sharp, John, 1645-1714.

titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning conscience wherein an account is given of the nature and rule and obligation of it : and the case of those who separate from the communion of the Church of England as by law established, upon this pretence, that it is against their conscience to join in it, is stated and discussed.
titleStmt.author: Sharp, John, 1645-1714.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Sharp. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
